Version 3.2M1 (Build id: I20050811-1530)
Failed to execute runnable
(org.eclipse.jface.util.Assert$AssertionFailedException: null argument;)

In the Resource Perspective, Navigator View, right-click copy a directory, then
paste in the parent to create a sibling directory to the original correctly pops
up a dialog to choose a new name, but then I get:

Failed to execute runnable
(org.eclipse.jface.util.Assert$AssertionFailedException: null argument;)

It seems all of the files and subdirs were created OK.

org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.browsing.PackagesViewHierarchicalContentProvider.  
Moving to JDT/UI.

Dani, I pass this one to you. It looks like the
PackagesViewHierarchicalContentProvider passes in null as a parent.

Can you provide steps? I tried several scenarios without being able to
reproduce. I assume the Java Browsing perspective is open as well. What's your
exact setup?
